EmailTemplate.description: Sends email when Articles received date is entered.
EmailTemplate.name: Articles Received From State
EmailTemplate.subject: Articles Received from the Secretary of State
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Entities__c.AccName__c},

We have received your approved Articles for {!Entities__c.Name} from the Secretary of State of {!Entities__c.Organization_State__c}. Your official date of incorporation for this entity is {!Entities__c.Organizational_Date__c}. You are now permitted to conduct business under this name.

A copy of your filed documents is available in Viewable Documents in Box or through the Platinum Portal.

Platinum Members: Log into your Platinum Portal to see real-time status of your new company via the Entity Tracker. Thank you, Anderson Advisors, LLC
